1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Ubayy bin Ka'b said:"That was a concession that was granted in the early days of Islam, then we were commanded to have a bathe after that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وُجُوبِ الْغُسْلِ مِنَ الْتِقَاءِ الْخِتَانَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about the obligation of bath when the two circumcised parts meet
